description.german: Sammle insgesamt 1 Stunde Sturzzeit
description.french: Avoir passé plus d'une heure dans les airs suite à des chutes
description.spanish: Suma una 1 hora de tiempo total cayendo
description.schinese: 在游戏中跌落时间总长累计达到1小时
description.tchinese: 在遊戲中跌落時間總長積累至1小時
description.russian: Наберите час общего времени в падении
description.japanese: 累計落下時間が1時間を突破する
description.portuguese: Acumule 1 hora de tempo total de queda
description.brazilian: Acumule 1 hora de tempo total de queda
description.italian: Totalizza 1 ora di volo

description.english: Bump into other Fall Guys 1000 times in total
description.german: Remple insgesamt 1000-mal andere Charaktere an
description.french: Buter dans d'autres personnages 1000 fois
description.spanish: Choca con otros Fall Guys 1000 veces en total
description.schinese: 撞上其他糖豆人总次数达1000次
description.tchinese: 撞上其他糖豆人總次數達1000次
description.russian: Врежьтесь в других чемпионов 1000 раз
description.japanese: 累計1000回、ほかのFall Guysにぶつかる
description.portuguese: Trombe com outros jogadores 1.000 vezes ao todo
description.brazilian: Trombe com outros jogadores 1.000 vezes ao todo
description.italian: Scontrati con gli altri Fall Guy 1.000 volte

description.english: Fall for at least 3 seconds before landing on your head
description.german: Falle mindestens 3 Sekunden lang, bevor du auf dem Kopf landest
description.french: Tomber pendant au moins 3 secondes avant d'atterrir sur votre tête
description.spanish: Cae durante al menos 3 segundos antes de aterrizar de cabeza
description.schinese: 跌倒后在空中飞至少3秒然后用头着地。
description.tchinese: 跌倒後在空中飛至少3秒然後用頭著地。
description.russian: При падении пролетите минимум 3 секунды перед тем, как приземлиться на голову
description.japanese: 3秒以上落下した後に頭から着地する
description.portuguese: Caia de cabeça após uma queda de pelo menos 3 segundos
description.brazilian: Caia de cabeça após uma queda de pelo menos 3 segundos
description.italian: Cadi per almeno 3 secondi prima di atterrare di testa

description.english: Knock someone over
description.german: Schubse jemanden um
description.french: Faire tomber quelqu'un
description.spanish: Derriba a alguien
description.schinese: 把其他人撞翻
description.tchinese: 把其他人撞翻
description.russian: Сбейте кого-нибудь с ног
description.japanese: ほかのプレイヤーを張り倒す
description.portuguese: Derrube um jogador
description.brazilian: Derrube um jogador
description.italian: Fai cadere qualcuno

description.english: Bump into 3 people while rolling on the ground before getting up
description.german: Remple beim Rollen auf dem Boden 3 Leute an, bevor du aufstehst
description.french: Buter dans 3 personnages tout en roulant sur le sol avant de vous relever
description.spanish: Choca con 3 personas mientras ruedas por el suelo antes de levantarte
description.schinese: 在地上打滚过程中撞上三个人再起来
description.tchinese: 在地上打滾過程中撞上三個人再起來
description.russian: Упадите и, пока будете кататься по земле, успейте врезаться в трех человек, перед тем как встать
description.japanese: 地面に転がりながら3人のプレイヤーにぶつかる
description.portuguese: Trombe com 3 jogadores enquanto rola no chão antes de levantar
description.brazilian: Trombe com 3 jogadores enquanto rola no chão antes de levantar
description.italian: Colpisci 3 persone rotolando per terra prima di alzarti

description.english: Reach terminal velocity
description.german: Erreiche die Endgeschwindigkeit
description.french: Atteindre la vitesse maximale possible
description.spanish: Alcanza la velocidad terminal
description.schinese: 达到最高加速
description.tchinese: 達到最終速度
description.russian: Выйдите на предельную скорость
description.japanese: 最高速に達する
description.portuguese: Chegue à velocidade terminal
description.brazilian: Chegue à velocidade terminal
description.italian: Raggiungi la velocità massima
